name: BubbleBubbleBall
description:
A boring little ball is wandering in space while it meets those lovely colorful bubbles
A place is big enough to kill time
A giant stage filled with endless and all forms of bubbles Various tricks will lead to different paths
Dangerous space will strangle the live out of your balls

Easy to play, you can randomly pop bubbles to speed up or slow down
But remember, damaged bubbles are pretty much dead, bubbles lose energy are pretty much dead, frozen bubbles are also pretty much dead. How high of scores your can get in such crazy place? COME & TRY !

Features
- Endless mode
- Full Screen mode (1024 x 768) or windowed mode (1024 x 768)
- To challenge higher score
- Bubbles have different function
- Bubbles will help you speed up, slow down, provide health point & score
- Leading ball has health point which will be cut down if you hit the walls, and add up if you hit bubbles
- A spacious yet tricky space map for you to explore
- Times are set to show how much longer the ball can survive
- Speed bar to show how fast you are doing
- Background music volume settings
-

How to play
- Left arrow and Right arrow to move bat
- Up arrow and Down arrow to move wall
- Press V to Skill
- use bat to control ball
- ball out of space GameOver
- health point zero GameOver
- speed lower than 20km GameOve
